text: Edmund Baidoo (born 30 January 2006) is a Ghanaian professional footballer. He plays as a Forward for Austrian Bundesliga club Red Bull Salzburg. He also plays for the U19 team of Salzburg in the UEFA Youth League. ==Career == Baidoo started his career at AsanSka FC. In March 2024 he moved to Sogndal Fotball in Norways second division . He made his debut in April 2024. In total he made 19 second division appearances for Sogndal. There he scored seven goals. After five months in Norway, Baidoo moved to the Austrian Bundesliga club FC Red Bull Salzburg in August 2024. FC RB Salzburg Homepage He made his debut for Salzburg on September, 25th in the Cupmatch versus Wiener Viktoria. In minute 3 he scored his first goal for the team. title: Edmund Baidoo
